name: Music Journey
description:
Title:Music Journey

Description:
A music game which leads you through different kinds of music.
Play and take a jurney to unknown, dicover the music. It's waiting for you.

Mechanics:
Look for notes on the map, right note opens a way to another ones.
When you hold a red note you can open red fence and other red obstacles.
In the center of the map are four instruments, put right notes into it.
On every map another note suits it and plays another music.
Clock is ticking! Find out how fast you can pu notes together and finish the game.

If you would like to see this game being developed, please vote and leave a comment :)

Greetingz,

Serioulsy Touched Developers
